MATRIX_HELP: Tap on an item below to see related items. Long press to see more info.
TARGET_HELP: Tap on targets to see their rationale.
INFO: The WSIS Action Lines are eighteen areas of activity in which governments, civil society entities, businesses and international organizations could work together to achieve the potential of ICTs for development. Through this app, discover the linkages between the WSIS Action Lines and the United Nation's Sustainable Development Goals.
WSIS: World Summit on the Information Society (WSIS)
WSIS_INFO: A multi-stakeholder conference organized by the International Telecommunications Union of the United Nations.
WSIS_MATRIX_INFO: Linking WSIS Action Lines with Sustainable Development Goals.
ABOUT_TEXT: The ICT4SDG application was developed to display linkages between the World Summit on the Information Society Action Lines and the United Nation's Sustainable Development Goals.
ABOUT_MORE: This application was developed by The University of the West Indies' AgriNeTT team in cooperation with the WSIS Secretariat. AgriNeTT is an Agriculture ICT project of the St. Augustine campus of The University of the West Indies . It has developed several applications aimed at assisting farmers and those in the agriculture sector.
